item.description:
Come float on the Saco the legendary Brettl-Hupfers way.

Cost: $65 for members/$85 for guests
Includes room & board, secured tubing parking, and catered BBQ Saturday night.

RSVP by Friday July 13th. Spaces fill up fast!!!

Please mail payment made out to BHSC to:
(please specify food choice Teriyaki Beef, BBQ Chicken or Veggie)

Brian Pfaffinger
PO BOX 541
North Pembroke, MA 02358

or via Paypal to treasurer@brettl.org please add 3% fee($66.95/$87.55) and email brianpfaffinger@gmail.com with your info and food choice.

Tubing parking passes available for EISCL members staying at other houses $15 per car.
item.name: Darlene's 24th Annual Tubing Trip
